page.title: 18Religion in Tockwith
page.content: Survey done by 30 children about religion in Tockwith. In our block there are 3 places of worship. In Tockwith there is the Church of the Epiphany and the Methodist Chapel. In Bilton-in-Ainsty is St. Helen's Church of England. Previously, Bickerton and Bilton had Methodist Chapels. Of 30 children, Penny goes to Tockwith CE Church weekly; no-one goes to Bilton Church; Jennifer and Jill go to Tockwith Methodist Chapel weekly. 6 children go to church or chapel once or twice a year on special occasions like Christmas Day. 3 children go to Sunday School. Paul Wilson wrote "Our family goes to church once or twice a year. My parents do not encourage me to go more often. Normally they have a lie in on Sunday morning, they are not interested in going.
